statements: DELETE FROM recording_metadata WHERE location = 'Farm A' AND crop_type = 'Corn';
DELETE FROM recording_metadata WHERE location = 'Farm A' AND crop_type = 'Corn' AND weather_conditions = 'Sunny';
DELETE FROM soil_health_data WHERE soil_moisture < 20 AND soil_ph > 6.5;
DELETE FROM location_metadata WHERE location_name = 'New York';
DELETE FROM recording_metadata WHERE location_id = 1 AND crop_type = 'Corn';
DELETE FROM Location WHERE city = 'New York';
DELETE FROM Location WHERE city = 'New York' AND country = 'USA';
DELETE FROM Crop WHERE crop_type = 'Corn' AND planting_date < '2022-01-01';
